articles.title: Australian woman becomes world`s first person to survive deadly flesh-eating bacteria - WION
articles.description: Australian woman becomes worlds first person to survive deadly flesh-eating bacteria
articles.content:
An Australian woman has become the world's first documented person to survive a pathogen which usually causes the deadly blackleg disease in sheep and cattle.
